Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Structural fatigue crack at stress point. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Canopy System component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: U - Lapses on the part of User
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 17/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon
